XenotypeDef.label: S'Lanter
XenotypeDef.description: Slanters are the shadow-folk of the wastes—lean, fast, and pale-skinned from lives spent beneath the surface or under the ruins. Their bodies have grown agile, their eyes wide, their senses sharp. To survive, they learned to vanish: to slip between light and dark, scavenging what others leave behind. Some call them cowards; others call them ghosts.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Humans adapted for stealth and scavenging in the wasteland’s shadows.
